abstract: Early evidence suggests that taking away hybrid cars' carpool-lane privileges actually slows the traffic speed in all lanes.
snippet: Early evidence suggests that taking away hybrid cars' carpool-lane privileges actually slows the traffic speed in all lanes.
lead_paragraph: Last spring I wrote about the indignation of hybrid car owners in California who were about to lose their rights to drive in the carpool lane. The state lawmakers who approved the July 1 cutoff seemed to take the position that virtue was its own reward.

headline.main: Ban Hybrids From the Fast Lane, and Everyone Slows Down
